title: Amazon API Gateway to AWS Lambda Container Image
description: This AWS CDK application demonstrates how to deploy ASP.NET Core Web API (.NET 6) to AWS Lambda as Container Image.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern uses .NET as a programming language to create the entire AWS CDK stack.
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Pankaj Rawat
authors.bio: Pankaj Rawat is a Lead Consultant at Amazon Web Services.

authors.name: Vijai Anand Ramalingam
authors.bio: Vijai Anand Ramalingam ia an Application Developer - ISV at Amazon Web Services
